text: "First Thing" by @XKCD comic - however accurate this may be, my hunch is this isn't how people think of the first thing they'll do after getting #COVID19 #vaccine, right? (Don't forget to come back for 2nd dose if required for the one you get.) https://t.co/4NwWMTQuYU #pandemic https://t.co/5L2vKJIbBL
